data.title: Obituaries
data.meta_site_name: The Voice of LaSalle County since 1952!
data.text:
Gerald (Jerry) Joseph Briel, 90, of Ottawa passed away peacefully Friday evening, August 16, 2024 at Illinois Veteran's Home of LaSalle surrounded by his loving family. Jerry was born October 12, 1933 to the late Francis and Veronica (Shandor) Briel. He married Lorraine (Brown) on October 6, 1956 at St. Patrick's Church in Ottawa, IL. Jerry served as a Corporal in the U.S. Army XVIII Airborne. After his military service he worked at Schrock Fertilizer before moving to Pilkington (LOF) where h...

WCMY News Aug 27, 2024

William Russell Serby, 64, of Ottawa, passed away suddenly on Friday, August 23, 2024. A memorial service will be held at 6 p.m. on Thursday, August 29, 2024 at the Mueller Funeral Home in Ottawa with Sally Rutledge-Ott, officiating. Visitation will be from 4 to 6 p.m. prior to the service at the funeral home. William was born on May 1, 1960 in Ottawa to Russell and Anne (Rutledge) Serby. He was a manager at Golden Rule Lumber, Ottawa for 28 years. He was married to Shelley (Onnen) Serby for ...

WCMY News Aug 26, 2024

Doris "June" (Peterson) Freebairn, 98, of Utica, passed away on Thursday, August 22, 2024 at the Pavilion of Ottawa. Funeral services will be held at 11 a.m. on Thursday, August 29, 2024 at Waltham Presbyterian Church, Utica with Rev. Joel Stevenor, Pastor, officiating. Burial will follow at Waltham Cemetery. Visitation will be 9 to 11 a.m. Thursday at the church prior to the funeral services. Arrangements have been entrusted to the Mueller Funeral Home, Ottawa. Doris was born on Ju...

WCMY News Aug 25, 2024

Martha (Thorson) Jacobs, 66, of Seatonville, passed away on Friday, August 23, 2024 at the OSF Saint Francis Medical Center in Peoria following a courageous and tenacious battle with cancer. Funeral services will be at 10:30 a.m. on Wednesday, August 28, 2024 at Bethel Lutheran Brethren Church in Ottawa with Pastor Randy Mortenson, officiating. Entombment will follow at 1:30 pm at Valley Memorial Park, Spring Valley. Visitation will be from 4 to 8 p.m. on Tuesday, August 27, 2024 at the Muell...

WCMY News Aug 24, 2024

Seferina M. Jarigese, 91, of Ottawa, died Thursday, August 22nd, at Lightways Hospice and Serious Illness Care Center of Joliet. The visitation will be held at Ottawa Funeral Home on Tuesday, August, 27th from 9-11 AM with prayers at 11 AM. The Funeral Ceremony will follow at the funeral home at 11 AM with Monsignor Meridian officiating. The graveside service will follow at St. Columba, followed by the luncheon at The Knights of Columbus. Sefie was born August 26th, 1932, in Ottawa, to Eugeni...

WCMY News Aug 23, 2024

Lyle W. Hathorn, 97, of Ottawa, passed away on Tuesday, August 20, 2024 at the Illinois Veterans Home in LaSalle. Visitation will be from 9 to 11 a.m. on Monday, August 26, 2024 at Fox River Lutheran Church, in Sheridan. Funeral services will follow at 11 a.m. at with Rev. Kevin Garner, Pastor officiating. Burial will be at 2:30 p.m. at Abraham Lincoln National Cemetery in Elwood. Arrangements have been entrusted to the Mueller Funeral Home in Ottawa. Lyle was born in Earlville on November 9,...

WCMY News Aug 21, 2024

Francis "Rudy" Maierhofer, 95, of Seneca, passed away Monday, August 19, 2024, at the home he lived in for 70 years, next door to the family farm he was born and raised on. Visitation will be held on Sunday, August 25, from 3:00 pm until 7:00 pm at St. Patrick Catholic Church in Seneca. During the visitation, there will be indoor seating away from the heat. Mass of Christian burial will be held on Monday, August 26, at 10:00 am at St Patrick's Church, with Fr. G officiating. Burial...

WCMY News Aug 20, 2024

Lisa Michelle Burns, 55, of Ottawa, passed away unexpectedly due to breathing complications on Friday, August 16, 2024 at OSF St. Elizabeth Medical Center in Ottawa. A memorial visitation will be held on Thursday, August 22, from 4:00 pm until 7:00 pm at Ottawa Funeral Home. Lisa was born June 12, 1969, in Danville, IL, to Cheryl (Sallee) Lamb and Darryl Turner. She married Todd Burns on August 1, 1998, in Marseilles. Lisa loved the outdoors. She was constantly hiking at Starved Rock and Matt...

WCMY News Aug 19, 2024

Shirley Day, 80, of Marseilles, passed away Sunday, August 18, 2024 at her home surrounded by her family. Following Shirley's wishes, no services will be held. Cremation rites have been entrusted to Ottawa Funeral Home. Shirley was born April 12, 1944, in Shelby County, Indiana, to Wm. Floyd and Virginia (Lowery) Tungate. She married Larry Day on September 29, 1992 in Ottawa, IL. Shirley worked in health care as a home care worker for many years. In her free time, she loved to go to the river...

WCMY News Aug 18, 2024

Patricia Ann (Carr) Wagner, 91, of Ottawa, passed away on Friday, August 16, 2024 at Pleasant View, in Ottawa. Funeral services will be held at 10 a.m. on Wednesday, August 21, 2024 at the Mueller funeral Home in Ottawa, with Rev. Seamus Enright, Pastor of First United Methodist church officiating. Burial will follow at Oakwood Memorial Park. Visitation will be one hour prior to the service, at the funeral home. Patricia was born on January 20, 1933, in Ottawa, Illinois, to Raymond and Ruth (...

WCMY News Aug 18, 2024

Robert "Bob" D. Walsh, 81, of Ottawa, passed away peacefully at his home on August 15th, 2024 surrounded by his loving family. A visitation will be held on Tuesday, August 20, from 4:00 pm until 7:00 pm at Ottawa Funeral Home. Mass of Christian Burial will take place on Wednesday, August 21, at 10:00 am, at St. Patrick's Church, with Msgr. Mark Merdian officiating. Burial will follow at St. Columba Cemetery. Bob was born on July 20, 1943, to William and Florence Walsh. On June 6, 19...

WCMY News Aug 16, 2024

Shirley Lyle, 89, of Ottawa, passed away peacefully on Thursday, August 8, 2024 at her home surrounded by her family. She loved crafts, cooking, euchre, her card club, and the Chicago Cubs. Most of all she loved spending time with her family. She battled scleroderma for 25 years with grace and dignity. She is survived by James, her devoted husband of 69 years, daughters, Lori (bob) Bowers, Sandy (Alex) Lunt, Sue (Bonnie) Lyle, son, James (Betsy) Lyle, seven grandchildren, and 9 great-grandchi...

WCMY News Aug 12, 2024

Betty (Soulsby) Gillette, 86, of Ottawa passed away on Monday August 5, 2024 following a tragic accident in rural Tonica. Funeral services will be held at 11 a.m. on Friday, August 16, 2024 at the Mueller Funeral Home in Ottawa, with Rev. Seamus Enright, Pastor, of the First United Methodist Church, officiating. Burial will follow at Oakwood Memorial Park, Ottawa. Visitation will be from 4 to 7 p.m. on Thursday, August 15, 2024 at the funeral home. Additional visitation will be from 10 a.m. u...

WCMY News Aug 09, 2024

Paul Anthony Forino, 78, of Ottawa, IL, passed away at 6:15PM on August 2nd, 2024. The visitation will be held at Ottawa Funeral Home on Thursday August 8th from 4-7PM. The rosary will be recited at 6:45PM. The funeral service will be held at the funeral home the following day on Friday August 9th at 10:00AM with Chaplin Dean Tieman officiating. There will also be a luncheon held at the Knights of Columbus at 11:30AM following the funeral service. Paul was born September 27, 1945 in Streator,...

WCMY News Aug 06, 2024
